# 1. User Story

### As a
(type of user or system)

### I want
(the capability or feature)

### So that
(the business or user value)

### Description / Notes:
Optional extra context, assumptions, or constraints.

### Dependencies:
Anything that must exist first (auth system, database, infra, etc.)

### Out of Scope:
What is explicitly not included in this story.
